title.rendered: Thembelani Further Education and Training College Application 2025 | Apply Now

content.rendered:
Thembelani Further Education and Training College Application 2025, How to register online for Thembelani Further Education and Training College 2025,  Thembelani Further Education and Training College courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year have been released by the management of Thembelani Further Education and Training College.

Thembelani Further Education and Training College online application is ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to Thembelani Further Education and Training College
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for Thembelani Further Education and Training College Application 2025

For Thembelani Further Education and Training College Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for Thembelani Further Education and Training College 2025

Apply Now.
